### Competency Evidence
To demonstrate these skills, I built a **Serverless Inspection Pipeline** and a **Carbon-Aware Scheduler**.

#### **A. Serverless AI Pipeline (Edge-to-Cloud)**
*Objective: Sub-100ms defect detection for manufacturing.*

![](images/Serverless AI Pipeline for Quality Inspection description/diagram-export-4-26-2025-12_59_07-PM.png){width=100%}

* **Tech Stack:** AWS Greengrass, Lambda, IoT Core, PyTorch.
* **Key Result:** Achieved <100ms latency using local edge inference.
* [**View Source on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/Serverless-AI-Pipeline-for-High-Throughput-Quality-Inspection-on-AWS){.btn .btn-primary role="button"}

#### **B. Carbon-Aware Agentic Scheduler**
*Objective: Reducing AI training carbon footprint by 13.4%.*

```{mermaid}
%%| label: fig-carbon
%%| fig-cap: "Multi-Agent Workflow"
flowchart LR
    Watcher[Watcher Agent] -->|Polls Grid API| History[(Grid History)]
    History -->|Carbon Forecast| Scheduler[Scheduler Agent]
    Scheduler -->|Decision| Action{Run or Defer?}
    Action -- High Carbon --> Defer((Defer Job))
    Action -- Low Carbon --> Run((Run Now))

```

* **Architecture:** A multi-agent system using **LangGraph** to shift workloads to low-carbon time windows.
* **Key Result:** 13.4% reduction in CO2 emissions during "Golden Week" simulation.
* [**View Source on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/carbon-aware-scheduler){.btn .btn-primary role="button"}

:::

### Competency Evidence

My Master's dissertation focused on **calibrated uncertainty quantification** for the Irish Power System.

#### **Net-Load Forecasting with MC-Dropout**

* **Methodology:** Developed a **MC-Dropout LSTM** network to predict net-load volatility.
* **Anomaly Detection:** Implemented Residual-Based detection using **Deep SVDD**.
* **Key Artifacts:** * *Uncertainty Plots:* Visualized 80% and 95% confidence intervals.
* *Statistical Validation:* Confirmed superiority over ARIMA-GARCH using Diebold-Mariano tests.



[**Download Dissertation Overview (PDF)**](files/Dissertation 21189676 Muwanguzi Jonathan.pdf){.btn .btn-info role="button"}
